name: consul-kv-monitor
description: Service to monitor key-value records in consul

scripts.tests: yarn run unit-tests && yarn run func-tests
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha  --print both -- --opts tests/mocha.opts -R spec ./tests
scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --opts tests/mocha.opts -R spec ./tests && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
